titleInfo.title: Research Data for submission: Explicit knowledge of sensory non-redundancy can reduce the strength of multisensory integration

mods.abstract: These are the raw data collected for and analyzed in the submitted manuscript: "Explicit knowledge of sensory non-redundancy can reduce the strength of multisensory integration."
